extendedInfo.description: The ultimate stopwatch tool for trainers, coaches, sportsmen and other people that time more than one action or contestant at the same time. Ideal for karting, auto / car racing, motorbike racing, swimming, athletics, cycling, ... Forget about expensive specific multichronometers! Multiple stopwatches / multi chronometerÂ· Up to four indenpendent chronometers (2 in free version)The first app specially thought for touch devices Â· Thanks to big touch areas and haptic feedback you'll always know which crono you are pointing with your fingers. You won't loose a second of the action you're timing! Â· Intuitive interface. General or detailed view. Switch between them with just a gesture Â· Portrait or landscape timingHave a clear idea of what you time with each chronometer Â· Chronometers visualization with color, name and number Â· Keep your list of usual contestants and use them when you wantOrganize and keep what you time Â· Organization by events and sessions Â· You can review the timings of all the events and sessionsGet more information from the timing Â· Each chrono can have up to 99 split times per lap Â· Time distance between lap or split marks of the chronometers Â· Average lap time for each chronometer Â· Best lap for each chronometer and absolute best lap of the session Â· Difference between each lap and the absolute best lap Â· Session elapsed time, current session laps Â· Text notes on sessions and eventsStart mode: Start all four chronos at the same time (only in PRO version)Tipical manual timing mistakes: No problem! Energy multiChrono mC2 helps you Â· Have you made a mistake marking a lap? Delete the created lap and everything is like before Â· Did you forget to mark a lap? Mark lap on a next finish-line cross and mC2 will let you divide the lap in equal laps so that your lap list keeps consistent (only in PRO version)Note: Timing layout not optimized for low resolution devices or tablets
